plot: Gorth comes to the Earth for one night each hundred years. He has only one night to find the right person to honour his/her promise. But this time it will not be so easy.
title: Gorth
plot_es: Gorth comes to the Earth for one night each hundred years. He has only one night to find the right person to honour his/her promise. But this time it will not be so easy.
plot_en: Gorth comes to the Earth for one night each hundred years. He has only one night to find the right person to honour his/her promise. But this time it will not be so easy.
